name: Jetpack Cat Madness: Animal Warriors Adventure
name_original: Jetpack Cat Madness: Animal Warriors Adventure
description:
The cats have gotten their furry little paws on some jetpacks and it's mayhem in the city!

Jetpack Cat Madness is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Keep your jetpack cat soaring high above the city - but you better be on guard! The skies are dangerous - and you want to help kitty keep all her nine lives!

How long can you keep going and avoid the obstacles in the air? How much catnip can you collect along the way? You'll start going faster and faster, so try to keep going as long as you can!

Collect enough catnip and you can unlock more cats for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect catnip to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Jetpack Cat Madness right now while it's 100% FREE!
